TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kuli, title = Kuli, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kuli} }

S.FORM: Kuli Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Kuli a niyaro', 33 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 130 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 124 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 86%, Amis 3%, Paiwan 2%, Truku 2%, roma 3%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Koli Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Koli a niyaro', 33 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 130 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 124 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 86%, Amis 3%, Paiwan 2%, Troko 2%, roma 3%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
